001package csv2html;
002
003import java.io.BufferedWriter;
004import java.io.File;
005import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
006import java.io.FileOutputStream;
007import java.io.IOException;
008import java.io.OutputStreamWriter;
009import java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException;
010import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
011import java.util.ArrayList;
012import java.util.Calendar;
013import java.util.List;
014
015import utility.StringUtility;
016
017/**
018 * ライタ：情報のテーブルをHTMLページとして書き出す。
019 */
020public class Writer extends IO {
021    /**
022     * htmlのフッターに表示する作者の名前
023     */
024    public static final String htmlAuthor = "Okayama Kodai";
025
026    /**
027     * ライタのコンストラクタ。
028     * @param aTable テーブル
029     */
030    public Writer(Table aTable) {
031        super(aTable);
032
033        return;
034    }
035
036    /**
037     * HTMLページを基にするテーブルからインデックスファイル(index.html)に書き出す。
038     */
039    public void perform() {
040        Attributes attributes = this.attributes();
041        String fileStringOfHTML = attributes.baseDirectory() + attributes.indexHTML();
042        File aFile = new File(fileStringOfHTML);
043        try (FileOutputStream outputStream = new FileOutputStream(aFile);
044                OutputStreamWriter outputWriter = new OutputStreamWriter(outputStream, StringUtility.encodingSymbol());
045                BufferedWriter aWriter = new BufferedWriter(outputWriter);) {
046
047            this.writeHeaderOn(aWriter);
048            this.writeTableBodyOn(aWriter);
049            this.writeFooterOn(aWriter);
050
051        } catch (UnsupportedEncodingException | FileNotFoundException anException) {
052            anException.printStackTrace();
053        } catch (IOException anException) {
054            anException.printStackTrace();
055        }
056
057        return;
058    }
059
060    /**
061     * 属性リストを書き出す。
062     * @param aWriter ライタ
063     * @throws IOException 入出力エラーが発生した場合
064     */
065    public void writeAttributesOn(BufferedWriter aWriter) throws IOException {
066
067        aWriter.write("<tr>");
068        aWriter.newLine();
069        this.attributes().names().forEach((aName) -> {
070            try {
071                aWriter.write("<td class=\"center-pink\">");
072                aWriter.write("<strong>");
073                aWriter.write(aName);
074                aWriter.write("</strong>");
075                aWriter.write("</td>");
076                aWriter.newLine();
077            } catch (IOException exception) {
078                throw new RuntimeException(exception);
079            }
080        });
081        aWriter.write("</tr>");
082        aWriter.flush();
083
084        return;
085    }
086
087    /**
088     * フッタを書き出す。
089     * @param aWriter ライタ
090     * @throws IOException 入出力エラーが発生した場合
091     */
092    public void writeFooterOn(BufferedWriter aWriter) throws IOException {
093        Calendar aCalendar = Calendar.getInstance();
094        SimpleDateFormat aDateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss");
095        String dateString = aDateFormat.format(aCalendar.getTime());
096        aWriter.write("<div class=\"right-small\">");
097        aWriter.write("Created by ");
098        aWriter.write(Writer.htmlAuthor);
099        aWriter.write(" (CSV2HTML written by Java) ");
100        aWriter.write(IO.htmlCanonicalString(dateString));
101        aWriter.write("</div>");
102        aWriter.newLine();
103        aWriter.write("</body>");
104        aWriter.newLine();
105        aWriter.write("</html>");
106        return;
107    }
108
109    /**
110     * ヘッダを書き出す。
111     * @param aWriter ライタ
112     * @throws IOException 入出力エラーが発生した場合
113     */
114    public void writeHeaderOn(BufferedWriter aWriter) throws IOException {
115        aWriter.write(
116                "<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC \"-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN\" \"http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/loose.dtd\">");
117        aWriter.newLine();
118        aWriter.write("<html lang=\"ja\">");
119        aWriter.newLine();
120        aWriter.write(
121                """
122                        <head>
123                            <meta http-equiv=\"Content-Type\" content=\"text/html; charset=UTF-8\">
124                            <meta http-equiv=\"Content-Style-Type\" content=\"text/css\">
125                            <meta http-equiv=\"Content-Script-Type\" content=\"text/javascript\">
126                            <meta name=\"keywords\" content=\"Java,Oriented,Programming\">
127                        """);
128        aWriter.write(String.format("<meta name=\"description\" content=\"%s\">", super.attributes().titleString()));
129        aWriter.newLine();
130        aWriter.write(String.format("<meta name=\"author\" content=\"%s\">", Writer.htmlAuthor));
131        aWriter.write("""
132                <style type=\"text/css\">
133                <!--
134                body {
135                        background-color : #ffffff;
136                        margin : 20px;
137                        padding : 10px;
138                        font-family : serif;
139                        font-size : 10pt;
140                }
141                a {
142                        text-decoration : underline;
143                        color : #000000;
144                }
145                a:link {
146                        background-color : #ffddbb;
147                }
148                a:visited {
149                        background-color : #ccffcc;
150                }
151                a:hover {
152                        background-color : #dddddd;
153                }
154                a:active {
155                        background-color : #dddddd;
156                }
157                div.belt {
158                        background-color : #eeeeee;
159                        padding : 0px 4px;
160                }
161                div.right-small {
162                        text-align : right;
163                        font-size : 8pt;
164                }
165                img.borderless {
166                        border-width : 0px;
167                        vertical-align : middle;
168                }
169                table.belt {
170                        border-style : solid;
171                        border-width : 0px;
172                        border-color : #000000;
173                        background-color : #ffffff;
174                        padding : 0px 0px;
175                        width : 100%;
176                }
177                table.content {
178                        border-style : solid;
179                        border-width : 0px;
180                        border-color : #000000;
181                        padding : 2px 2px;
182                }
183                td.center-blue {
184                        padding : 2px 2px;
185                        text-align : center;
186                        background-color : #ddeeff;
187                }
188                td.center-pink {
189                        padding : 2px 2px;
190                        text-align : center;
191                        background-color : #ffddee;
192                }
193                td.center-yellow {
194                        padding : 2px 2px;
195                        text-align : center;
196                        background-color : #ffffcc;
197                }
198                -->
199                </style>
200                """);
201        aWriter.write(String.format("<title>%s</title>", super.attributes().titleString()));
202        aWriter.write("</head>");
203        aWriter.newLine();
204        aWriter.flush();
205        return;
206    }
207
208    /**
209     * ボディを書き出す。
210     * @param aWriter ライタ
211     * @throws IOException 入出力エラーが発生した場合
212     */
213    public void writeTableBodyOn(BufferedWriter aWriter) throws IOException {
214        aWriter.write("<body cz-shortcut-listen=\"true\">");
215        aWriter.newLine();
216        aWriter.write("<div class=\"belt\">");
217        aWriter.newLine();
218        aWriter.write("<h2>");
219        aWriter.write(super.attributes().captionString());
220        aWriter.write("</h2>");
221        aWriter.newLine();
222        aWriter.write("</div>");
223        aWriter.write("<table class=\"belt\" summary=\"table\">");
224        aWriter.write("<tbody>");
225        aWriter.write("<tr>");
226        aWriter.write("<td>");
227        aWriter.write("<table class=\"content\" summary=\"table\">");
228        aWriter.write("<tbody>");
229        aWriter.flush();
230
231        this.writeAttributesOn(aWriter);
232        this.writeTuplesOn(aWriter);
233
234        aWriter.write("</tbody>");
235        aWriter.write("</table>");
236        aWriter.write("</td>");
237        aWriter.write("</tr>");
238        aWriter.write("</tbody>");
239        aWriter.write("</table>");
240        aWriter.write("</hr>");
241
242        return;
243    }
244
245    /**
246     * タプル群を書き出す。
247     * @param aWriter ライタ
248     * @throws IOException 入出力エラーが発生した場合
249     */
250    public void writeTuplesOn(BufferedWriter aWriter) throws IOException {
251        //タプルの色を指定するHTMLのクラス属性の名前
252        List<String> classNames = new ArrayList<>();
253        classNames.add("center-blue");
254        classNames.add("center-yellow");
255
256        Integer index = 0;
257        Integer numberOfClasses = classNames.size();
258        for (Tuple aTuple : this.table().tuples()) {
259            String className = classNames.get(index);
260            aWriter.write("<tr>");
261            aWriter.newLine();
262            aTuple.values().forEach((aValue) -> {
263                try {
264                    aWriter.write("<td class=\"");
265                    aWriter.write(className);
266                    aWriter.write("\">");
267                    aWriter.write(aValue);
268                    aWriter.write("</td>");
269                    aWriter.newLine();
270                } catch (IOException exception) {
271                    throw new RuntimeException(exception);
272                }
273            });
274            aWriter.write("</tr>");
275            index = (index + 1) % numberOfClasses;
276        }
277        return;
278    }
279}
